The most comfortable pants. I ordered 2 more. I'm obsessed.
These pants are great. They are stretchy,  comfortable and flattering. The waffle pattern isn't even noticeable. I am going to buy more.

These IUGA slacks are really nice. I am surprised at how much I like the waffle knit fabric in slacks since this is my first waffle knit pair of slacks. The slacks drape very nicely, and I appreciate the look of a finished waistband with the advantage of an elastic waist. I believe the slacks run a little larger than the chart states. The chart states a 28.3 inseam for medium; the pant is about two inches long on me. 5'3" 135#. My usual attire is leggings or yoga pants, and I love that I have this pair of dressier slacks. These will look so nice with a cream sweater or a back turtleneck. Because of the finished waistline, I can wear them with a top tucked in or out.

These pants are very comfortable with flattering wide leg style. The material is very soft and the elastic waistband gives them a very casual feel while easily being able to dress them up for a more professional look. If you are in between sizes I do recommend sizing down. They will still be wearable and comfortable but a size down would’ve widen my options with these.

These pants are well-made with a design that leans toward formal wear, but the fabric provides a more athletic, relaxed feel. They're perfectly labeled as "business casual" and are great for days when you want something more polished than leggings or yoga pants but still comfortable and put-together. Highly recommend for anyone looking for that perfect balance of style and ease!

I absolutely love this style of pants. It is not only very comfortable to wear, but it is also so versatile you could wear this to the office or at home. I love the billowing around the waist. This fabric is also so comfortable. I never wear a belt with it, but it has belt loops. It’s easy to slip on and off. I like to wear this with bodysuits or crop tops. This can be dressed up or dressed down. It fits me perfectly and I’m a shorter person.

I don't even know where to begin with what I love about these pants. Actually, that's not true. I love how comfortable they are, but there is so much more than that! These pants are so on-trend and easy to wear. I love the texture of the fabric and the way these pants have held up after many washings. I honestly wear these to work at least once a week - they're just so good!

The description on these pants read, "waffle knit..." I didn't know what to expect but hoped for the best. I'm happy to say that these pants are great! They're comfortable and easy to care for. The construction is solid and the fabric is comfortable. The seams are finish, there weren't any loose threads or issues with symmetry. I'm 5'4" 142# and I got the medium petite. They fit perfect and don't drag on the ground when I walk. I really like that they are versatile - I can dress them up with leather shoes or dress them down with my  platform sneakers. They are perfect "apartment pants".  I really want to get more of them, especially pink and dark olive colors. I didn't realize it until later but I have already ordered capri yoga/running pants from this company. I've had them for years and they have maintained their quality. I am confident that these waffle knit pants will be the same.

The IUGA waffle wide-leg work pants are fantastic for everyday wear! They’re high-waisted and provide a comfortable fit without sacrificing style. The material is breathable, making them perfect for both work and casual outings.

Step into comfort and style with IUGA Waffle Wide Leg Work Pants! These pull-on trousers are perfect for the modern woman, featuring a high-waisted design that elongates your legs and offers a flattering fit. Ideal for the office, casual outings, or business meetings, these pants provide the perfect blend of professionalism and comfort. Make your day a little easier—and a lot more stylish!

These pants are great to dress up or down. These are very versatile and can be a comfortable option of pants for many different occasions. These have significant pockets. The inseam is long enough for me, I normally struggle with pants being short.

I am so glad I got these. I got so many compliments on these pants. I wish I could wear them everyday! Aside from how cute they are (love the pink), they are so attractive for a work/office setting. I paired them with these beautiful white oxford shoes that I also got from Amazon and a fun white/patterned button up top. I felt like the most put-together version of myself ever.

I ordered these not entirely sure about the fit and material. The XL was a little long even though the inseam is 28” so I ordered them in petite. They fit perfectly on my 180lbs, 5’4 frame. I’ve received many compliments on it. I wish they’d come in more colors.

评论概述: Short Girl Friendly and super comfy
评论详情: These are perfect for the short girlies, especially if you like to wear heels. My daughter is 4/11 and she has the hardest time finding pants that aren't too long. These were good, as they were not super long, she had to wear heels with them though. If you're 5" these would probably be better for you as far as length goes. The material feels like good quality, stretchy all over and feels like you're wearing pajamas. They are really comfortable to wear! Overall, I wish they were a tab bit shorter, but they work with heels.

These pants have the potential to look nice enough to wear to work- if you get the right size.  I would definitely size down on these.  I'm 5'2" 155lb and the size chart suggested Large.  I should have ordered Medium.  The waist is quite stretchy and it needs to be stretched a bit taut to eliminate awkward bunching at the back.  The material bunches right at the center back of my waist below the waistband and it looks awkward AF.  But if I pull the waistband tight it looks way better.  For reference, I have a 32" waist and these pants probably could go on a 35-36"  inch waist comfortably and look good without bunching.The stated length of the non petite pants in 28" and that seemed correct- my inseam is a little shorter than that and they are just a tad long where I'd need heels.The material is a bit heavy,  but aside from the backside bunching it hangs nicely.

I love these dress pants. I wear it for business casual and professional days. You can dress it up or down. They’re very comfortable and made of great material. I received exactly what I expected to received.

评论概述: Lightweight fabric, very comfortable and stylish!
评论详情: I recently got the IUGA Waffle Knit Wide Leg Pants, and they have quickly become one of my favorite pieces! The material is incredibly soft and cozy, perfect for both lounging at home and dressing up for casual outings. The waffle knit adds a nice texture that feels unique and stylish.

Comfortable pair of stretchy pants. They weren't quite my style because the wide leg wasn't flattering but I can see it work well for taller, slimmer girls. I'm 5' tall and it was a couple inches long but would work with heels.

评论概述: Comfort with Waffle Knit Wide Leg Pants
评论详情: These waffle knit wide leg pants are beyond comfortable. I usually wear a size small, and these fit perfectly at the waist and hips without feeling too snug. They’re incredibly relaxing to wear, and the legs flow beautifully as you walk.  The pink color is lovely—feminine yet subtle enough to pair with a variety of tops. I love how flattering these pants are, combining style with comfort. The wide leg trend is perfectly captured in this design. I’m really happy to have added these to my wardrobe!
These pants are true to size and the style is cute. They are definitely not for winter, very light weight.  These have not been washed and dried yet so I cannot speak to the durability of them.

I got these IUGA Waffle Knit Wide Leg Pants to have another option to wear to work. They fit true to size and are pretty comfortable! These pants feel more casual, which is great for a long day at work, but you can dress them up or dress them down for any occasion.

These pants are actually nicer than I'd thought they would be!  They look dressy but they have an elastic waist band (no zippers but with the look of a zipper front).  Not bad to wear to work.  I was concerned about the "waffle knit" but it actually looks and feels quite nice.  The length is a bit long for my 5'3" though.  However the small size fit well and true to size for me.
My only issue is that they are short on me, but I'm also 6' tall. They are very comfortable and would be great dressed up for work pants. I would get more if they came in a longer size.

评论概述: Great pants! Comfortable and Business Casual
评论详情: I love these pants! I ordered them because as a teacher, I can't wear jeans to school, but I can wear business casual and these fit the bill perfectly. I am 5'3 and I chose a Large Petite - perfect size. I took them right out of the package and wore them the next day. Great pants! Highly Recommend!

These wide-leg pants fit true to size, and the elastic waistband ensures that they fit at the bottom and the top of a given size.  I love the button detail in the front -- it's amazing how much a single button can change the look of pull-on pants. The waffle-texture fabric is lightweight, yet substantial enough to drape/fall well.  I'm 5' 4", and the length comes almost to the floor.  Shorter women may find the length a problem, and taller women will have some wiggle room.-- Debbie Lee Wesselmann
These are classy pants that can be dressed up or down. Quality is nice and they fit well. In my opinion they are more mid waisted pants than high waisted.
